mapper.update: update workflow_log_message set operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, message = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, event_id = #{eventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, has_attatchment = #{hasAttatchment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select log_id, operator, create_time, message, event_id, has_attatchment from workflow_log_message
